nodes.description: 1983年10月19日下午5:30，南非比勒陀利亚Nedbank Square建筑外发生汽车炸弹爆炸，造成16人死亡、130余人受伤
nodes.support_text: 1983: Car bomb in South Africa kills 16 At least 16 people have been killed and more than 130 people injured in a car bomb explosion in South Africa's capital city, Pretoria.

nodes.description: 爆炸产生数百英尺高的浓烟，蓝色阿尔法罗密欧汽车残骸与人体碎片散落现场
nodes.support_text: Bled to death A huge pall of smoke rose hundreds of feet into the air as debris and bodies were strewn around the scene of the explosion.

nodes.description: 炸弹专家到场排查第二枚炸弹，爆炸导致玻璃金属碎片飞溅伤及大量行人
nodes.support_text: Bomb disposal experts were called to the scene to search for a possible second bomb.

nodes.description: 比勒陀利亚警察局长证实部分遇难者为南非空军人员，包括黑人和白人
nodes.support_text: South Africa's Minister for Law and Order, Louis le Grange, who visited the scene immediately, blamed the attack on the ANC.

nodes.description: 南非内政部长路易斯·勒·格朗杰现场指责非国大实施恐怖袭击
nodes.support_text: He said: 'I have no doubt who is responsible for this despicable attack.'

nodes.description: 非国大代理主席奥利维尔·坦博称Nedbank Square是合法目标但未承认责任
nodes.support_text: Oliver Tambo... said the Nedbank Square building was a legitimate target.

nodes.description: 警察局长指出部分重伤者因严重 mutilation 无法身份识别
nodes.support_text: General Mike Gedenhuys... said: 'Many of the victims are so badly mutilated they have not yet been identified.'

nodes.description: 国防部长马努斯·马兰将事件定性为共产主义势力针对南非的恐怖犯罪
nodes.support_text: General Magnus Malan... described the explosion as a 'cowardly, criminal deed in the Communist war being raged against South Africa'.

nodes.description: 政府数据显示过去五年非洲因恐怖主义死亡超4万平民、8.3万军人
nodes.support_text: South Africa has nearly five million whites, 21 million blacks, nearly one million Indians and about 2.5 million people of mixed race.

nodes.description: 南非种族构成：白人490万、黑人2100万、印度裔100万、混血250万
nodes.support_text: The government's apartheid system denies citizenship rights to black people except in 10 remote homelands.

nodes.description: 非国大警告将升级针对白人少数统治的斗争行动
nodes.support_text: The ANC has warned it intends to step up its campaign to bring an end to white minority rule.

nodes.description: 警方用铁丝网封锁周边区域
nodes.support_text: Police sealed off the surrounding area with a barbed-wire fence as emergency personnel sifted through the rubble looking for bodies.

nodes.description: 紧急人员筛选瓦砾寻找尸体
nodes.support_text: 紧急人员筛选瓦砾寻找尸体

nodes.description: 玻璃和金属被抛射到空中
nodes.support_text: 爆炸产生数百英尺高的浓烟，蓝色阿尔法罗密欧汽车残骸与人体碎片散落现场

nodes.description: 商铺橱窗和窗户被炸毁
nodes.support_text: 炸弹爆炸导致玻璃金属碎片飞溅伤及大量行人
爆炸产生数百英尺高的浓烟，蓝色阿尔法罗密欧汽车残骸与人体碎片散落现场

edges.support_text: It is understood the bomb had been placed in a blue Alfa Romeo car outside the multi-storey building, which houses the South African air force headquarters. It exploded at the height of the city's rush-hour as hundreds of people were leaving work for the weekend.
炸弹专家到场排查第二枚炸弹，爆炸导致玻璃金属碎片飞溅伤及大量行人

More than 20 ambulances attended the scene and took the dead and injured to three hospitals in and around Pretoria. Police sealed off the surrounding area with a barbed-wire fence as emergency personnel sifted through the rubble looking for bodies.
爆炸产生数百英尺高的浓烟，蓝色阿尔法罗密欧汽车残骸与人体碎片散落现场
General Mike Gedenhuys, Police Commissioner, said: 'Many of the victims are so badly mutilated they have not yet been identified.'

He said: 'I have no doubt who is responsible for this despicable attack.' He said the explosion was the 'biggest and ugliest' terrorist incident since anti-government violence began in South Africa 20 years ago.
Oliver Tambo... said the Nedbank Square building was a legitimate target.
General Magnus Malan... described the explosion as a 'cowardly, criminal deed in the Communist war being raged against South Africa'.
South Africa has nearly five million whites, 21 million blacks, nearly one million Indians and about 2.5 million people of mixed race.
The ANC has warned it intends to step up its campaign to bring an end to white minority rule.
